import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; const [items, setItems] = useState[{ title: "", description: "", completed: false, }] const showState = () => { console.log(items) } showState() function App() { return (
{setItems({ ...items, title: e.target.value })}} className="form-control" id="title" value={items.description} type="text" name="title" placeholder="Add task.." />
); } export default App;
